synopsis.text: Chihiro Furuya, a zombie enthusiast, stumbles upon the charming Rea Sanka, and together they embark on an unusual journey of resurrecting his deceased cat. In a twist of fate, Rea transforms into a zombie herself, compelling Chihiro to take responsibility for his actions. As Rea navigates her newfound zombie strength in both academic and domestic settings, Chihiro's cat, Babu, finds himself captivated by a living feline. Meanwhile, a scientist specializing in zombies sets foot in Japan, eager to discover fresh specimens. This extra episode, included in the 6th BD/DVD volume, offers a unique glimpse into life from Babu's perspective as a zombie.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
